en.title: About Us
en.content: Neon Color is a leading Egyptian company located in Cairo city - EGYPT, specializing in engineering field, leading in the manufacture of embossed letters and cladding plates. It is famous for executing major projects all over Egypt and for being the first hand in manufacturing. We always strive to provide the highest standards of accuracy that meet the expectations of all our customers.
en.mission: Providing highest standards of accuracy and quality in embossed letters manufacturing and facade cladding
en.vision: To be the leading company in advertising, decoration and engineering in Egypt and Middle East
